# 赛斯书：心灵的本质

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xinlingde-benzhi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xinlingde-benzhi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xinlingde-benzhi
xinlingde-benzhi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xinlingde-benzhi
xinlingde-benzhi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
